transcript:
[[The narrator stands on a beach at night, staring out across the moonlit ocean]]
Narrator: THE SEA ALWAYS MAKES ME REALIZE
Narrator: HOW SMALL I REALLY AM.
Narrator: I SHOULD GET ONE OF THOSE PUMPS.
{{Tooltip: And then a second one, to drain the ocean.}}
alt: And then a second one, to drain the sea.
title: The Sea

transcript:
You just WON The Game.
It's OK! You're free!
alt: I'm as surprised as you!  I didn't think it was possible.
title: Anti-Mindvirus

alt: Did you know they can actually physically throw you out of SIGGRAPH?
title: Slides
